about_the_game:
“Nostalgic Straw Hat” for Ryza that will allow you to change Ryza’s hat to a stylish straw hat.

Note:
- Hats can be changed in the “Changing Room” accessible through the desk in the Atelier.
- This accessory is identical to the one previously released.
- Please visit the official website for more information on the featured content.
